lead_paragraph: The head of the police force struggled to keep his composure as he apologized to hundreds of women who were sexually harassed or discriminated against as employees of the force.

headline.print_headline: Mounties Chief Offers Apology to Mistreated Female Officers
headline.main: Women in Royal Canadian Mounted Police Get an Apology for Years of Harassment

snippet: The head of the police force struggled to keep his composure as he apologized to hundreds of women who were sexually harassed or discriminated against as employees of the force....
abstract: Commissioner Bob Paulson of Royal Canadian Mounted Police apologizes to women who were sexually harassed or discriminated against while working as officers or staff on force; apology is part of settlement in two class-action lawsuits that will also result in payment of more than 100 million Canadian dollars to plaintiffs.
